snippet.title: Black Book – Cinematic Story Intro
snippet.description:
Support the game on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/morteshka/black-book-an-rpg-rooted-in-slavic-mythology

Welcome to the mysterious, yet intriguing world of Black Book - an Adventure game mixed with deck building turn-based combat.

Add the game to your wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1138660/Black_Book/
